elements.description: Dynamically create a new spine node.
elements.name: gui.new_spine_node

parameters.doc: node position
parameters.name: pos

parameters.doc: spine scene id
parameters.name: spine_scene

parameters.doc: spine node that should play the animation
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: id of the animation to play
parameters.name: animation_id

parameters.doc: playback mode - `gui.PLAYBACK_ONCE_FORWARD` - `gui.PLAYBACK_ONCE_BACKWARD` - `gui.PLAYBACK_ONCE_PINGPONG` - `gui.PLAYBACK_LOOP_FORWARD` - `gui.PLAYBACK_LOOP_BACKWARD` - `gui.PLAYBACK_LOOP_PINGPONG`
parameters.name: playback

parameters.doc: optional table with properties - `blend_duration` [number] The duration of a linear blend between the current and new animation - `offset` [number] The normalized initial value of the animation cursor when the animation starts playing - `playback_rate` [number] The rate with which the animation will be played. Must be positive
parameters.name: play_properties

parameters.doc: function to call when the animation has completed
parameters.name: complete_function

parameters.doc: spine node that should cancel its animation
parameters.name: node

elements.description: The returned node can be used for parenting and transform queries. This function has complexity O(n), where n is the number of bones in the spine model skeleton.
elements.name: gui.get_spine_bone

parameters.doc: spine node to query for bone node
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: id of the corresponding bone
parameters.name: bone_id

elements.description: Set the spine scene on a spine node. The spine scene must be mapped to the gui scene in the gui editor.
elements.name: gui.set_spine_scene

parameters.doc: node to set spine scene for
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: spine scene id
parameters.name: spine_scene

elements.description: Returns the spine scene id of the supplied node. This is currently only useful for spine nodes. The returned spine scene must be mapped to the gui scene in the gui editor.
elements.name: gui.get_spine_scene

parameters.doc: node to get texture from
parameters.name: node

elements.description: Sets the spine skin on a spine node.
elements.examples:
Change skin of a Spine node

function init(self)
  gui.set_spine_skin(gui.get_node("spine_node"), "monster")
end
elements.name: gui.set_spine_skin

parameters.doc: node to set the spine skin on
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: spine skin id
parameters.name: spine_skin

elements.description: Gets the spine skin of a spine node
elements.name: gui.get_spine_skin

parameters.doc: node to get spine skin from
parameters.name: node

elements.description: Gets the playing animation on a spine node
elements.name: gui.get_spine_animation

parameters.doc: node to get spine skin from
parameters.name: node

elements.description: This is only useful for spine nodes. The cursor is normalized.
elements.name: gui.set_spine_cursor

parameters.doc: spine node to set the cursor for
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: cursor value
parameters.name: cursor

elements.description: This is only useful for spine nodes. Gets the normalized cursor of the animation on a spine node.
elements.name: gui.get_spine_cursor

parameters.doc: spine node to get the cursor for (node)
parameters.name: node

elements.description: This is only useful for spine nodes. Sets the playback rate of the animation on a spine node. Must be positive.
elements.name: gui.set_spine_playback_rate

parameters.doc: spine node to set the cursor for
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: playback rate
parameters.name: playback_rate

elements.description: This is only useful for spine nodes. Gets the playback rate of the animation on a spine node.
elements.name: gui.get_spine_playback_rate

parameters.doc: spine node to set the cursor for
parameters.name: node

elements.description: This is only useful for spine nodes. Sets an attachment to a slot on a spine node.
elements.name: gui.set_spine_attachment

parameters.doc: spine node to set the slot for
parameters.name: node

parameters.doc: slot name
parameters.name: slot

parameters.doc: attachment name. May be nil.
parameters.name: attachment

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Spine models in GUI
info.name: extension-spine
